alert.note: Alert for Banner; Cheyenne; Kimball (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 31 at 3:21PM CST until February 03 at 3:00AM CST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM TUESDAY TO 2 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches. * WHERE...Platte, Goshen, and eastern Laramie counties in southeast Wyoming including Wheatland, Torrington, and Pine Bluffs. Banner, Kimball, and Cheyenne counties in the Nebraska Panhandle including Kimball and Sidney. * WHEN...From 5 PM Tuesday to 2 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions along portions of Interstate 80 and 25. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commutes. The cold wind chills as low as 20 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
